snippet.title: Monster Medic - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab a friend and get ready frantic local-multiplayer fun with Monster Medic a Co-op Shoot'em Up for the iPad.

iTunes: https://geo.itunes.apple.com/app/monster-medic-lets-play-together!/id750726895?mt=8&at=1l3vstQ&ct=trailer

Save the giant monster 'Puffles' by flying into it's body and destroying the attacking germs. Two-players control a single ship Monster Medic and frantically use its thrusters, blasters, mini-cannons and repair vehicle.  Comradery and exceptional teamwork will help you solve this mysterious illness.
